header.text: Welcome to CCDI Open Data Sharing asfsdfads

mission.text:
**Empowering Research** through collaborative data sharing

The Childhood Cancer Data Initiative (CCDI) is committed to making pediatric cancer data accessible and reusable to drive scientific discovery and improve outcomes for children with cancer.

cards.title: Data Submission
cards.content: Submit your research data to contribute to pediatric cancer research

cards.title: Data Access
cards.content: Access and analyze comprehensive pediatric cancer datasets

cards.title: Collaboration
cards.content: Connect with researchers and share insights
